subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Missouri all-American receiver Jeremy Maclin could play this Saturday against Southeast Missouri State, a university spokesman said Monday. Maclin was carted off the field with a sprained left ankle during the Tigers’ 52-42 victory Saturday against Illinois. He had a 99-yard kickoff return and 234 all-purpose yards for the No. 6 Tigers.
